extendedInfo.description: ********NOTE:  ReelSquare has PUBLIC rooms, NOT this app.********ReelPortal is a "private rooms"-only video chat and conference app for Android 2.3 or above. Designed to work with multiple platforms, its features include:* No account or personal data required* Video conference with multiple friends and family* Create your own locked private room* Bring your own server (optional)*** WATCH THESE DEMOS ***http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3sBDeSE87F0http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nnprDpfaVAAReelPortal is room-centric. You automatically connect to everyone in a room when you enter it. No need to call them individually.Meeting on ReelPortal is similar to doing a teleconference: schedule a time and room. When participants sign on, you see/hear them right away.REQUIREMENTS:- Dual-core CPU- Headset to avoid echoes- Android 2.3 or aboveIMPORTANT: Carefully consider the number of outgoing and incoming streams your device and network are capable of. If lagging, set resolution to 320x240.Homepage: www.reelportal.comNOTE: ReelPortal for Android only works with ReelPortal app on other platforms (QNX/iPhone/iPad/Windows/Mac/Linux). It does NOT work with Skype, FaceTime, Qik, Oovoo, Tango, Fring, etc.

reviews.title: This looks like the one I have been looking for
reviews.comment: I Have 3 computers wirelessly connected at home and 2 android phones connected to the same LAN network. I was looking for a software using which I would be able to chat between any of these 5 devices at any given time regardless of whether the internet is working or if the internet is down. I hope I have found what i was looking for.  Update:  I have installed the reel portal on my PC andandroid mobile. On my PC I have unstalled both the exe files for windows, also installed adobe air, but when i start reelportal it says \"ReelPortal timed out. Retrying...\" What can i do to overcome this error.
reviews.author: Prabhanand Prakash Ganatra

reviews.title: Good app.
reviews.comment: Lags a little bit but that depends on all parties connections. Just lower the resolution if so. Perfect for my Playbook video chat w android and apple.
reviews.author: A Google User
